page.title: 12School
page.content: At 1.15 PM the boys go to the recreation field to play cricket while the girls do sewing.At the moment I am creating a picture of an old man fishing just using coloured wool sewed in straight lines.Some girls are making patchwork covers or macrame plant holders.When sewing has finished we watch a BBC science programme.After a break we get out our science books and answer questions written on the blackboard.To this we add some of our own notes.If we have finished before half past three then we have a story read to us.I like spooky stories best.
